MS MCQs

    Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement

    »

    1. “Continuous Collaboration enables teams to innovate outside of the boundaries of planned meetings.” Which of the following value considerations conflict with the quoted statement?

      Following a plan over responding to change

      Working software over comprehensive documentation

      Customer collaboration over contract negotiation


    2. Aligning KPIs with habits is important because it helps achieve positive business outcomes. Which of the following habits is important for reinforcing KPIs and setting teams up for success?

      Valuing test results over variations in efficiency

      Having a production-first mindset

      Valuing team capacity over non-actionable metrics


    3. What is value stream mapping?

      A concept that organizes objects of value in an idealized workflow stream

      An activity that maps value to different programming activities as a way to identify work components that have the highest value

      A methodology that helps visualize complex work systems and address the disconnects, redundancies, and gaps in how work gets done


    4. In addition to what’s stated in its definition, what does value stream mapping help identify and quantify?

      Customer value declarations

      Waste

      Development milestones


    5. Which of the following is important for DevOps leadership to measure?

      Team velocity

      Number of bugs

      Impact
